file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-12-06 - CONFIG-1 - MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYURETHANE FILM - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYURETHANE FILM - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the polyurethane film at the doors of the main landing gears. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYUR- 32-10-12-200-801-A ♦ EMB-145 ETHANE FILM - INSPECTION/CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 32-10-12 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-12-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYURETHANE FILM - INSPECTION/CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to do an inspection on the polyurethane film at the doors of the main landing gears. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYURETHANE FILM AMM TASK 32-10-12-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL MAIN LANDING-GEAR DOOR POLYURETHANE FILM AMM TASK 32-10-12-400-801-A/400 - INSTALLATION S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 722 722 RH MLG Doors - RH 732 732 LH MLG Doors - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main landing-gear doors EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 CONFIG-1 32-10-12 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-005-B (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released. Refer to AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200. (2) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve. Refer to AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200. (3) Make sure that the safety pins of the landing gears are installed. Refer to AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200. J. Visual Inspection on the Main Landing-Gear Door Polyurethane Film (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-005-B (1) Visually examine the polyurethane films of the main landing-gear doors for erosion or small damage. (2) Make sure that the polyurethane film is correctly bonded to the main landing-gear doors. (3) If a damage is found in the main landing-gear doors, refer to AMM TASK 32-10-12-000-801-A/400 and AMM TASK 32-10-12-400-801-A/400 to replace the polyurethane film. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-005-B (1) On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve. Refer to AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 CONFIG-1 32-10-12 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
